service-connectiq.watch_outdated:
You seem to be using an old version of the list app on your device {{device}}.

Please update the app on your watch to be able to use all functions.
service-connectiq.watch_outdated_dontremind: Do not notify again for this version

comp-listeditor.reset_info:
On your watch, all items on this list will be reset to "not done" at a certain interval.

This is suitable for recurring tasks such as household chores or other regular activities.
comp-listeditor.sync_info:
When you make changes to the list, such as adding or deleting list items, these changes will be automatically transferred to your watch in the background.

Please note that the storage of the app on your watch is limited and that synchronisation can drain up the battery charge of the watch more quickly.
Do not synchronise too many lists at the same time.
comp-listeditor.sync_settings:
To activate automatic synchronisation, you must activate the corresponding option in the settings.
Would you like to go to the settings?

comp-listitemeditor.hidden_info:
Hidden list items are not transferred to your watch but remain on the smartphone.

This is useful if you temporarily do not want to display certain items, but you do not want to delete them either. They can be reused later.
comp-listitemeditor.locked_info:
Locked list items are not deleted when the list is cleared.

This simplifies tidying up the list if you regularly want to reuse certain items.

comp-watchlogs.title: Transmit logs
comp-watchlogs.text:
To transfer the logs from your watch, you must first start the app on your watch

{{name}}

If the app is running, the logs should be transferred automatically. This may take a few seconds.
comp-watchlogs.logs_received_confirm:
The logs have been received.

Would you like to see them now?

page_firststart.language2: You can change the language later if needed.
page_firststart.garmin2:
This allows you to sync your lists with your Garmin watch.
You need the Garmin Connect IQ app on your smartphone and the Lists app on your watch.
page_firststart.garmin-hint1:
Sometimes, you may not be able to transfer lists to your watch, even though it is correctly recognized.

In most cases, restarting your smartphone or watch will solve the issue.
page_firststart.garmin-hint2: Unfortunately, I have no influence on how the Garmin Connect app works, as it acts as a bridge for communication with your watch.
page_firststart.finish1: Thank you for using my app.
page_firststart.finish2: If you're interested in my other projects, you can find more information on

page_listitems.nolist:
Something went wrong :(

The list can not be displayed.
page_listitems.add_new_hint: Create a new item in the list.

page_trashitem.empty: The trash of the list is empty.

Click here to get to the Garmin ConnectIQ Store.

page_settings_logs.show_watch_note: Displays the logs of the watch. The app must be running on the watch

page_settings_showlogs.log_empty: The log could not be loaded.
page_settings_showlogs.select_logday_title: Show log files of a certain day:
page_settings_showlogs.no_log_note: No log files were found for {{date}}

page_settings_confirm.delete_list_note: Request confirmation when deleting a list.
page_settings_confirm.delete_listitem_note: Request confirmation when deleting a list item.
page_settings_confirm.empty_list_note: Request confirmation when emptying a list.
page_settings_confirm.erase_list_note: Request confirmation when finally removing a list from the trash.
page_settings_confirm.erase_listitem_note: Request confirmation when finally removing a list item from the trash.
page_settings_confirm.empty_trash_note: Request confirmation when emptying the trash.
page_settings_confirm.restore_list_note: Request confirmation when restoring a list from the trash.
page_settings_confirm.restore_listitem_note: Request confirmation when restoring a listitem from the trash.
page_settings_confirm.undo_warning: Warning: The action can not be undone!
page_settings_confirm.transmit_list_note: Request confirmation when transferring a list to a watch.

page_lists_transmission.openontransmit: Open app after transmitting a lis manually
page_lists_transmission.openontransmit_note: Request on your watch whether the app should be opened when you transfer a list?
page_lists_transmission.deletelist: Automatically delete lists on the watch
page_lists_transmission.deletelist_note: When deleting a list on your smartphone, also delete the list on your watch.
page_lists_transmission.synclist: Automatically sync lists with the watch
page_lists_transmission.synclist_note: When making changes to a list, sync it with the watch immediately.
page_lists_transmission.synclist_warning:
Attention: Keep in mind that the app's storage space on the watch is limited. You shouldn't sync too many lists at the same time!
Additionally, it may also have a negative impact on the watch's battery life.
page_lists_transmission.synclist_disable:
Do you want to disable the automatic synchronization for all lists?

If you enable this setting again later, you will need to reconfigure the synchronization for each list again.
page_lists_transmission.garminconnectiq_note:
Deactivate this setting if you do not own a Garmin watch or do not want to use the transfer functions.
If this setting is activated, the Garmin ConnectIQ app is required on your smartphone.

page_settings_trash.use_trash_note: Move lists to the trash when deleting instead of permanently removing them.
page_settings_trash.use_trash_listitem_note:
Move list items to the trash instead of permanently removing them.
A separate trash bin is used for each list.
page_settings_trash.instock: Keep list items in the trash
page_settings_trash.instock_note: How long should old lists or list items be kept in the trash?
page_settings_trash.confirm_cleartrash:
Should the trash be emptied?

Warning: The action can not be undone!
page_settings_trash.confirm_clearitemstrash:
Should the trashes be emptied?

Warning: The action can not be undone!

page_appinfos.support:
I developed this app in my spare time and without financial ulterior motives.
It is and remains free and open source.

If you like it and want to support me,
then why don't you buy me a coffee?
page_appinfos.review: Or write a nice review in the Garmin ConnectIQ Store
page_appinfos.website: For my other projects, visit my website:

page_privacy.admob_consent_note: Have personalized advertising displayed or revoke this.
page_privacy.policy_note: This statement explains what data is collected.
